item.title: 维诺德-科斯拉（Vinod Khosla）称未来五年内 "融合将成为现实
item.description:
这位亿万富翁投资人认为，这项技术是为人工智能推动的数据中心繁荣脱碳的一种方式。【原文：

The billionaire investor sees the technology as a way to decarbonize the AI-fueled data center boom.

】

item.title: 印度雄心勃勃推动经济发展，融资热潮成为焦点：印度信贷论坛
item.description: 孟买火车站附近的乘客。【原文：Commuters near the train station in Mumbai.】

item.title: 香港承诺将 IPO 审核缩减至约 100 天
item.description: 香港承诺在约 100 天内完成对公司的审核和首次公开募股，以保证首次公开募股申请者在规定时间内完成申请。【原文：Hong Kong pledged to vet and debut companies in about 100 days in a bid to guarantee a set time frame for initial public offering applicants.】

item.title: 俄罗斯与迪拜新公司合作增加液化天然气影子船队油轮
item.description: 迪拜一家新成立的公司接管了三艘液化天然气油轮，这似乎是俄罗斯规避西方制裁的最新努力。【原文：A newly established company in Dubai has taken over three liquefied natural gas tankers, in what appears to be Russia’s latest effort to circumvent Western sanctions.】

item.title: 机器人汽车的失败让特斯拉的高股价看起来摇摇欲坠
item.description: 上周，特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.投资者的失望也让市场质疑特斯拉股票的溢价估值。【原文：Tesla Inc.’s reveal of its much-hyped self-driving car last week left investors underwhelmed and sent shares plunging. The disappointment also left the Street questioning the shares’ premium valuation.】

item.title: 前 Freepoint 顶级天然气交易员计划成立自己的对冲基金
item.description: 弗雷迪-西泽（Freddie Sizer）是 Freepoint Commodities LLC 欧洲天然气实物交易的前负责人，他已开始为一家新的对冲基金筹集资金，该基金将寻求从该地区能源市场日益加剧的价格波动中获利。【原文：Freddie Sizer, a former head of European physical gas trading at Freepoint Commodities LLC, has started to raise money for a new hedge fund that will seek to profit from increasing price swings in the region’s energy markets.】

item.title: 欧洲惨淡财报显示股民为何更青睐美国
item.description: 欧洲最大的公司接连发布盈利预警，与美国财报季的乐观开局形成鲜明对比。【原文：A flurry of profit warnings issued by Europe’s biggest companies — in sharp contrast with an upbeat start to the US earnings season — show why the region’s equity markets will likely continue to trail Wall Street.】

item.title: LinkedIn 上令人尴尬的帖子在快速增长的 Subreddit 上被大量转载
item.description:
在 LinkedIn Lunatics 上，67 万名会员哀叹微软旗下专业社交网站上 "令人难以忍受 "的内容越来越多。【原文：

On LinkedIn Lunatics, 670,000 members lament the rise of ‘insufferable’ content on the Microsoft-owned professional networking site.

】

item.title: 萨索尔天然气供应和石油波动引发可持续发展风险
item.description: 沙索有限公司（Sasol Ltd.）的天然气储量不断下降，且易受油价波动的影响，这使该公司的业务可持续性及其减排计划受到了严格审查。【原文：Sasol Ltd.’s declining gas reserves and its susceptibility to volatile oil prices is drawing scrutiny over the sustainability of the business and its plans to reduce emissions.】

item.title: 瑞典房东 SBB 的分拆公司在斯德哥尔摩交易首日下跌
item.description: 瑞典最大的住宅地产上市公司在斯德哥尔摩上市交易的第一天就受到了投资者的冷遇。【原文：Sweden’s biggest listed residential property firm received a lukewarm welcome from investors on its first day of trading in Stockholm.】

item.title: 新加坡零售商 Scion 的豪宅降价 500 万美元
item.description: 在新加坡的豪宅市场上，锦鲤池、可停放 10 多辆汽车的停车位以及可容纳 20 人并配有吊灯的餐厅都不足以吸引购房者。【原文：A koi pond, parking space for more than 10 cars, and a dining hall for 20 people with a chandelier aren’t enough to attract buyers in Singapore’s luxury property market.】

item.title: 韩国考虑放弃对基于算法的韩元贸易的人工监督
item.description: 韩国正在考虑废除要求基于算法的货币交易必须有人在场的规定。【原文：South Korea is considering scrapping regulations that require the presence of humans for algorithm-based trading of its currency.】

item.title: 特朗普关税言论和欧洲央行减息令欧元平价威胁重现
item.description: 在本周的降息和唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）就任总统后可能引发全球贸易战的严峻提醒之后，金融市场上欧元跌至与美元平价的风险正在上升。【原文：The risk of the euro sliding to parity with the dollar is mounting in financial markets after this week’s interest-rate cut and stark reminder that a Donald Trump presidency could spark a global trade war.】

item.title: 梅布-法布尔谈多元化和战术配置中的大熊市
item.description:
为什么对冲赌注没有奏效？【原文：

Why hedging your bets hasn't been working.

】

item.title: 奇货可居：梅布-法贝尔谈多样化和分配（播客）
item.description: 奇货可居：梅布-法贝尔谈多样化和分配（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: Meb Faber on Diversification and Allocation (Podcast)】

item.title: 欧洲央行民意调查显示 2025 年欧元区通胀率将略低于 2
item.description: 欧洲中央银行对专业预测人员进行的季度调查显示，明年的通货膨胀率将略低于其目标。【原文：The European Central Bank will see inflation dip just below its target next year, according to its quarterly survey of professional forecasters.】

item.title: 莫迪家乡的印度城市考虑发行 2 亿美元绿色债券
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）的家乡古吉拉特邦（Gujarat）的一个城市正在酝酿发行首只绿色市政债券，销售所得将用于资助一系列旨在减少碳排放的项目。【原文：An Indian city in Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s home state of Gujarat is mulling its first green muni bond, with proceeds from the sale to be used for funding a range of projects aimed at reducing carbon emissions.】

item.title: 迪拜 Gateway 寻找 Tim Horton 海湾特许经营权的买家
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，总部位于迪拜的私募股权公司 Gateway Partners 正在考虑出售其在 Tim Hortons Inc.【原文：Dubai-based private equity firm Gateway Partners is considering selling its stake in the Gulf franchise of Tim Hortons Inc., four years after its initial investment in the Canadian coffee chain, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 肯尼亚领导人提名内政部长金迪基担任其副手
item.description: 肯尼亚总统威廉-鲁托（William Ruto）提名内政部长基图雷-金迪基（Kithure Kindiki）为其副手，以巩固其对权力的控制。【原文：Kenyan President William Ruto nominated Interior Secretary Kithure Kindiki as his deputy in a bid to consolidate his grip on power.】

item.title: 欧洲股市变化不大，因盈利不及预期引发恐慌情绪
item.description: 周五，欧洲股市变化不大，因为投资者对新一轮令人失望的最新财报进行了评估，这些财报进一步加剧了有关该地区经济实力的争论。【原文：European equities were little changed on Friday as investors assessed another round of underwhelming earnings updates, which added further to the debate over the strength of the region’s economy.】

item.title: K 银行因需求疲软放弃 IPO，计划明年重启
item.description: 根据周五提交的一份监管文件，在线贷款机构 K Bank Co. 因未能获得足够的投资者需求，已撤回其在首尔首次公开发行的 7 亿多美元股票。【原文：Online lender K Bank Co. has withdrawn its $700 million-plus initial public offering in Seoul after failing to generate enough demand from investors, according to a regulatory filing on Friday.】

item.title: Boohoo 首席执行官卸任，开始对公司进行战略审查
item.description: Boohoo Group Plc 首席执行官约翰-莱特尔（John Lyttle）即将卸任，因为这家陷入困境的在线零售商开始进行战略审查，有可能导致公司解体。【原文：Boohoo Group Plc Chief Executive Officer John Lyttle is stepping down as the struggling online retailer begins a strategic review that could potentially lead to a breakup of the company.】

item.title: 中国柴油出口降至 2023 年中期以来最低水平
item.description: 中国的柴油出口量创下自 2023 年 6 月以来的新低，原因是炼油厂要应对有限的装运配额和接近盈亏平衡的利润率。【原文：Diesel exports from China hit the lowest since June 2023 as refiners grappled with a limited shipment quota and near break-even margins.】

item.title: 游说团体称意大利汽车业生存艰难
item.description: 据一家汽车贸易集团称，如果以 Stellantis NV 为首的制造商不能扭转意大利汽车产量下降的趋势，意大利汽车业将面临生存威胁。【原文：Italy’s car industry faces an existential threat if manufacturers led by Stellantis NV don’t reverse a trend of declining production in the country, according to an automotive trade group.】

item.title: 欧洲央行穆勒认为通胀回落，但对服务业发出警告
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马迪斯-穆勒（Madis Muller）表示，随着该地区经济疲软，通胀率正在向欧洲中央银行设定的 2% 的目标迈进，但物价上涨的危险依然存在。【原文：Inflation is heading for the European Central Bank’s 2% goal as the region’s economy weakens but upside dangers to prices persist, according to Governing Council Member Madis Muller.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织与坦桑尼亚达成协议，释放 2.66 亿美元资金
item.description: 坦桑尼亚与国际货币基金组织达成协议，将从该机构获得近 2.66 亿美元的下一笔资金。【原文：Tanzania will receive close to $266 million from the International Monetary Fund after reaching a deal to secure the next tranche of funding from the lender.】

item.title: 随着需求恢复，IPhone 16 中国首发销量飙升 20
item.description: 与 2023 年的机型相比，苹果公司最新款 iPhone 手机前三周在中国的销量增长了 20%，这对于一款今年在全球最大智能手机市场上举步维艰的手机来说是一个积极的信号。【原文：Sales of Apple Inc.’s newest iPhones in China are up 20% in their first three weeks compared with 2023’s model, a positive sign for a device that struggled this year to gain traction in the world’s largest smartphone market.】

item.title: 涨幅达 31% 后桥水中国对冲基金增持本地股票
item.description: 桥水联合公司（Bridgewater Associates）的中国在岸对冲基金正在增加本地股票的投资，上个月的反弹使该基金今年的回报率上升至 31%，该基金称估值仍然具有吸引力。【原文：Bridgewater Associates’ onshore China hedge fund was adding exposure to local stocks after a rally last month boosted the fund’s returns to 31% for the year, saying valuations remained attractive.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国 9 月零售销售意外增长
沙特科技公司 Ejada 借助高盛进行 IPO，估值 15 亿美元
item.description: Ejada Systems Ltd. 正考虑在利雅得首次公开募股，估值高达 15 亿美元，这标志着一家技术服务公司在沙特阿拉伯罕见地上市。【原文：Ejada Systems Ltd. is considering an initial public offering in Riyadh at a valuation of as much as $1.5 billion, marking a rare listing by a technology services firm in Saudi Arabia.】
